ar.com.hjg.pngj

Interface IImageLineArray

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImageLineByte, ImageLineInt

    public interface IImageLineArray
    This interface is just for the sake of unifying some methods of ImageLineHelper that can use both ImageLineInt or ImageLineByte. It's not very useful outside that, and the user should not rely much on this.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getElem(int i)
      Get i-th element of array (for 0 to size-1).
      FilterType getFilterType() 
      ImageInfo getImageInfo() 
      int getSize()
      length of array (should correspond to samples)

    • Method Detail

      • getImageInfo

        ImageInfo getImageInfo()

      • getFilterType

        FilterType getFilterType()

      • getSize

        int getSize()
        length of array (should correspond to samples)

      • getElem

        int getElem(int i)
        Get i-th element of array (for 0 to size-1). The meaning of this is type dependent. For ImageLineInt and ImageLineByte is the sample value.
